article_title: Power Goes Out After Truck Strikes Pole In Yukon - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
A truck crashed into a power pole in Yukon overnight, knocking out power in the area for a short time.

The accident occurred at the intersection of Reno and Czech Hall. 1,700 people were without power for a brief time but that power has been restored.

There's no word on the cause of the accident, but the driver was not injured.

article_metadata.Description: Power was knocked out temporarily overnight in Yukon after an accident.
article_metadata.author: News9.com
